text:
I’m asking anyone to help me out with college text books & supplies for this next semester in the fall because I lost my job due to COVID-19 and I’m struggling while trying to stay strong for my grandma 🤕💗 R.I.P
Cashapp- $IsabellaWright1890 
Venmo- Isabella-Wright-13
